mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product(PROD_NO, PROD_NAME, PROD_DETAIL, MANUFACTURE_DAY, PRICE, IMAGE_FILE, REG_DATE) VALUES (SEQ_PRODUCT_PROD_NO.NEXTVAL, #{prodName:VARCHAR}, #{prodDetail:VARCHAR}, #{manuDate:VARCHAR}, #{price:NUMERIC}, #{fileName:VARCHAR}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'))
mapper.select: SELECT p.prod_no as prodNo, p.prod_name as prodName, p.prod_detail as prodDetail, p.manufacture_day as manuDate, p.price, p.reg_date as regDate, NVL(t.tran_status_code,0) as proTranCode FROM product p, transaction t WHERE p.prod_no = t.prod_no AND p.prod_no= #{value}
